articles.title: Trump administration seeks to block full SNAP payments for November
articles.description:
The court wrangling prolonged weeks of uncertainty for the food program that serves about 1 in 8 Americans, mostly with lower incomes.

The post Trump administration seeks to block full SNAP payments for November appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Trump administration aims to block full SNAP payments for November 2023.
Approximately 1 in 8 Americans rely on SNAP, impacting low-income families.
Boston residents may face food insecurity if SNAP payments are reduced.

articles.title: What to know about possible Red Sox free agent target Munetaka Murakami after posting
articles.description:
Murakami is considered to be the "Japanese Babe Ruth."

The post What to know about possible Red Sox free agent target Munetaka Murakami after posting appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox eye Munetaka Murakami, a top free agent from Japan, for upcoming season.
Murakami, known as the 'Japanese Babe Ruth,' posted impressive stats in 2023.
His signing could boost local fan engagement and team performance in Boston.

articles.title: Airlines are waiving fees, offering refunds due to reduced flight schedules
articles.description:
Find out what your airline is doing in response to the reduction in flying due to the government shutdown.

The post Airlines are waiving fees, offering refunds due to reduced flight schedules appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Airlines are waiving fees for Boston travelers affected by reduced flight schedules.
Major carriers like Delta and United are offering refunds starting November 2023.
Local residents can expect more flexible travel options during the government shutdown.

articles.title: After Cape Cod crash, readers say Mass. should tighten e-bike regulations
articles.description:
Readers say e-bikes should face tougher rules, citing safety concerns. Though others warn against overreaction.

The post After Cape Cod crash, readers say Mass. should tighten e-bike regulations appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Readers demand stricter e-bike regulations in Massachusetts after a recent Cape Cod crash.
Safety concerns have been raised by residents, prompting calls for legislative action.
Potential new rules could affect e-bike usage and safety for Boston commuters.

articles.title: Watch: Dog rescued from Ted Williams Tunnel
articles.description:
After initially evading capture, the dog eventually hopped into a waiting police cruiser.

The post Watch: Dog rescued from Ted Williams Tunnel appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police rescued a dog from the Ted Williams Tunnel on November 7, 2025.
The dog initially evaded capture but eventually entered a police cruiser.
This incident highlights the ongoing efforts of local authorities in animal rescue.
